courses.title: Elementary Korean I
courses.description: Introduction to listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Korean and to the culture of Korean-speaking regions.

courses.title: Elementary Korean II
courses.description: Continued listening, speaking, reading, and writing in Korean with further study of the culture of Korean-speaking regions.

courses.title: Special Topics
courses.description: Topics of current interest in Korean.

courses.title: Special Topics
courses.description: Topics of current interest in Korean.

courses.title: Intermediate Korean I
courses.description: A rapid review of grammar with continued use of listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills in Korean, all with a cultural emphasis.

courses.title: Intermediate Korean II
courses.description: This course focuses on listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills in Korean in an introduction to literature and within a cultural context.

courses.title: Intensive Intermediate Korean I
courses.description: This course teaches students an intermediate level Korean intensively during the summer LBAT study-abroad period in an immersed environment in Korea.

courses.title: Intensive Intermediate Korean II
courses.description: This course teaches students an intermediate level Korean intensively during the summer LBAT study-abroad period in an immersed environment in Korea.

courses.title: Internship Assistantship
courses.description: Modern Language Undergraduate Internship for pay for freshmen and sophomores, by permit only. The internship experience must be at a unit or agency approved by the School of Modern Language.

courses.title: Undergraduate Internship
courses.description: Modern Language Undergraduate Internship for credit for freshmen and sophomores, by permit only. The internship experience must be at a unit or agency approved by the School of Modern Languages.

courses.title: Research Assistantship
courses.description: Independent research conducted under the guidance of a faculty member.

courses.title: Undergraduate Research
courses.description: Independent research conducted under the guidance of a faculty member.

courses.title: Special Topics
courses.description: Topics of current interest in Korean.

courses.title: Special Topics
courses.description: Topics of current interest in Korean.

courses.title: Advanced Korean I
courses.description: Development of richer perspectives about Korean culture and enhanced skills in reading, writing, and vocabulary. Conducted in Korean.

courses.title: Advanced Korean II
courses.description: Further development of richer perspectives about Korean culture and enhanced skills in reading, writing, and vocabulary.  Conducted in Korean.

courses.title: Korean Conversation  and Culture
courses.description: The course will focus on developing students’ conversation skills and grammatical knowledge required for 3000-level courses or higher. Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Korean Culture: Old and New
courses.description: Comparison and contrast of aspects of the past and present. Topics include politics, music, the family, popular culture, war and many others. Taught in English.

courses.title: Korea in Media: K-Pop, Film, and Drama
courses.description: This course addresses key features of Korean society from the 1960s to the present day through K-Pop, film, and drama. Taught in English.

courses.title: Business Korean
courses.description: This course aims to improve oral/written communication skills in business situations in Korea.  Taught in Korean; part of Korean intensive summer language program.

courses.title: Current Issues and Technology in Korea
courses.description: This course introduces key terms and discusses advances in technology and science in Korea today.  Taught in Korean; part of Korean intensive summer language program.

courses.title: Exploring Modern Korea
courses.description: This course equips students to understand contemporary Korea through reading and discussion about contemporary topics.  Taught in Korean; part of Korean intensive summer language program.

courses.title: Special Topics
courses.description: Topics of current interest in Korean.

courses.description: Topics of current interest in Korean.

courses.title: Special Topics
courses.description: Topics of current interest in Korean.

courses.title: Special Topics
courses.description: Topics of current interest in the Korean languages.

courses.title: Contemporary Korean
courses.description: This course aims to further the students' knowledge by exposing them to accurate and contemporary expressions in text and multimedia materials.  Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Selected Readings Of Modern Korean
courses.description: This course aims to enhance students' Korean skills through advanced reading and comprehension, translation, grammar, and writing practice.  Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Media and Public Culture
courses.description: This is a debating course designed for students who have completed advanced Korean or have demonstrated an equivalent proficiency level. Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Korean Service-Learning in the Korean Community
courses.description: This class combines classroom discussion with community service projects to allow students to study Korean cultures and practice Korean with native speakers. Conducted in Korean.

courses.title: Intercultural Seminar
courses.description: Enhancement of students' skills and understanding of intercultural communication, skills, and behaviors for globalized business, research, and politics related to South Korea. Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Korean Society
courses.description: This course aims to develop students’ understanding of Korean society and culture through lectures, discussion, cultural site visits, and field work activities.  Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Korean Industry
courses.description: This intensive course is designed to enhance students’ intercultural understanding of Korean industry and cultural influence. Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Internship Assistantship
courses.description: Modern Language Undergraduate Internship for pay for junior and seniors, by permit only. The internship experience must be at a unit or agency approved by the School of Modern Languages.

courses.title: Korean Internship
courses.description: Professional experience with a business/organization in which students enhance their language skills and cultural knowledge in German in relation to the practical goals/objectives of the entity.

courses.description: Independent research conducted under the guidance of a faculty member.

courses.title: Special Problems
courses.description: Special problems course for advanced students. Topics to be arranged with instructor.

courses.title: Special Problems
courses.description: Special problems for advanced students. Topics to be arranged with instructor.

courses.title: Contemporary Korean
courses.description: This course aims to further the students' knowledge by exposing them to contemporary expressions in text and multimedia materials in Korean. Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Media and Public Culture Korean
courses.description: The course focuses on analysis of Korean media. Offered in Korean.

courses.title: DOM Internship Korean
courses.description: Student completes domestic internship. Conducted in Korean. Online course.

courses.title: Intercultural Seminar Korean
courses.description: This course aims to develop student’s cultural fluency, communication skills and competences required in a globalized context of business, research, and politics. Taught in Korean.

courses.title: Language Practicum Korean
courses.description: Students will serve as researchers, student aides and apprentice instructors for a 3000- or 4000-level undergraduate course approved by their adviser.

courses.title: Language Practicum Abroad Korean
courses.description: Students will serve as researchers, student aides and apprentice instructors for a 3000- or 4000-level undergraduate course approved by their adviser and the course.

courses.title: Internship Abroad Korean A
courses.description: Student completes internships in Korea.

courses.title: Internship Abroad Korean B
courses.description: Student completes internships in Korea.
